copy.title: Strategize
copy.copy: Who is really in pain when we hold on to resentments and grudges? Slow down and ask yourself what is really happening. Open your heart's eyes. Give yourself a break. Briefly notice any emotions, thoughts or sensations that may be driving fear and anxiety and let them be. Let go of the need to analyze and let be. Briefly notice any emotions, thoughts or sensations that may be driving fear and anxiety and let them be. Inhale slowly and exhale slowly. This discomfort will pass. Watch each breath appear and disappear, just breathing. Open your heart's eyes. Open your heart's eyes. Slow down and ask yourself what is really happening. Slow down and ask yourself what is really happening. Love is the first seed of the soul.

copy.title: Design
copy.copy: It will be ok. Give yourself a break. You can do this. Stop and focus on whatever is being carried within you and let be. Empty your mind; be formless, shapeless like water. It will be ok. Take a deep breath. Who is really in pain when we hold on to resentments and grudges? Love is the first seed of the soul. Love is the first seed of the soul. Inhale slowly and exhale slowly. It will be ok. Take a deep breath. Panic is your body revving up temporarily, but it will slow down. Give yourself a break.

copy.title: Develop
copy.copy: Open your heart to change, forgiveness and lovingkindness. Panic is your body revving up temporarily, but it will slow down. Live life one inhalation and one exhalation at a time. You can do what you set out to do; yes, you can. Bring love into your heart, into your breath and into your being. Inhale slowly and exhale slowly. Open your heart's eyes. This discomfort will pass. Open your heart to change, forgiveness and lovingkindness. Just acknowledge what's there and let be. Panic is your body revving up temporarily, but it will slow down.
